name: my-gg-plugins
description: Personal Claude Code toolkit curated from GGPrompts

plugins.name: ui-styling
plugins.description: Create beautiful, accessible user interfaces with shadcn/ui components, Tailwind CSS, and canvas-based visual designs

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge and workflows

plugins.name: bubbletea
plugins.description: Build terminal user interfaces with Go and Bubbletea framework - TUI apps, Elm architecture, Lipgloss styling

plugins.name: agent-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective Claude Code agents with system prompts, tool restrictions, and MCP integrations

plugins.name: docker-mcp
plugins.description: Comprehensive guide for Docker MCP Toolkit - discover and use ~170 MCP servers on-demand

plugins.name: xterm-js
plugins.description: Battle-tested patterns for xterm.js terminal implementations and React-based terminal applications

plugins.name: ai-multimodal
plugins.description: Process multimedia with Google Gemini - audio analysis, image understanding, video processing, document extraction

plugins.name: docs-seeker
plugins.description: Search for technical documentation using llms.txt standard, GitHub repos via Repomix, and parallel exploration

plugins.name: web-frameworks
plugins.description: Build full-stack web apps with Next.js App Router, Turborepo monorepos, and RemixIcon

plugins.name: canvas-design
plugins.description: Create beautiful visual art in PNG and PDF using design philosophy - posters, artwork, static designs

plugins.name: problem-solving
plugins.description: Collection of problem-solving techniques: meta-pattern recognition, collision-zone thinking, scale game, inversion

plugins.name: debugging
plugins.description: Systematic debugging skills: root cause tracing, defense-in-depth validation, verification before completion

plugins.name: prompt-engineer
plugins.description: Interactive prompt refinement with best practices and clipboard copy

plugins.name: handoff
plugins.description: Generate a handoff summary and copy to clipboard for continuing in new sessions

plugins.name: wipe
plugins.description: Generate handoff, clear context, and auto-continue in fresh session

plugins.name: gemini
plugins.description: Query Google Gemini for root cause analysis (read-only, no edits)

plugins.name: codex
plugins.description: Query OpenAI Codex for root cause analysis (read-only, no edits)

plugins.name: validate-plan
plugins.description: Project Plan Validation & Enrichment System

plugins.name: pmux
plugins.description: Interactive Prompt Engineer with tmux send-keys - directly send prompts to Claude Code sessions

plugins.name: pmux2
plugins.description: Interactive Prompt Engineer with tmux send-keys - v2 with improvements

plugins.name: mcp-manager
plugins.description: Manage MCP server integrations - discover tools/prompts/resources, analyze relevance, execute capabilities
